GisICurveSegmentAbstract Class Reference

#include <ICurveSegmentAbstract.h>

Inherits GisIDisposable.

Inheritance diagram for GisICurveSegmentAbstract:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisICurveSegmentAbstract class is an abstract geometric Curve Segment object. This class is used strictly as a component of curves and, thus, does not inherit from IGeometry.
